   20: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   21: -module(cover_nomerge_remote_SUITE).
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: 
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: 
   26: %% Default timetrap timeout (set in init_per_testcase).
   27: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [].
   31: 
   32: all() ->
   33:     [t1,t2].
   34: 
   35: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   36:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
   37:     Node = list_to_atom("ct_nomerge@"++Host),
   38:     pong = net_adm:ping(Node),
   39: 
   40: %% Include this row, and exclude the equivalent row in end_per_suite =>
   41: %% fails every now and then with missing data. Why?
   42: %%    ct_cover:remove_nodes([Node]),
   43:     ct_cover:add_nodes([Node]),
   44:     [{node,Node}|Config].
   45: 
   46: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     Node = ?config(node,Config),
   48:     ct_cover:remove_nodes([Node]),
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   52:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   53:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   54: 
   55: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   56:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   57:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   58:     ok.
   59: 
   60: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   61: %%% Test cases
   62: break(_Config) ->
   63:     test_server:break(""),
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: t1(Config) ->
   67:     Node = ?config(node,Config),
   68:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node, code, which, [cover_test_mod]),
   69:     ok = rpc:call(Node, cover_test_mod, foo, []),
   70:     ok.
   71: 
   72: t2(Config) ->
   73:     Node = ?config(node,Config),
   74:     cover_compiled = rpc:call(Node, code, which, [cover_test_mod]),
   75:     ok = rpc:call(Node, cover_test_mod, foo, []),
   76:     ok.
